body.p: We found that the standard deviation of X is 1.21. Now look at both probability distributions carefully. Which of the following do you think is true about the standard deviation of Y?

multiple_choice.choice: The standard deviation of Y is greater than 1.21.
The standard deviation of Y is less than 1.21.
The standard deviation of Y is roughly equal to 1.21.
